MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power fault in   LL77 postcode area of Llangefni, affecting properties in Rhosmeirch and the surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 10:02PM. Our engineers are on site and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, we expect the power to be restored by 1:15AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:20PM on 22nd February 2021
